en: Double Dagger
Discard 2 cards. Deal damage equal to sum of their values.
Enflame
Discard a Red card. Increase your damage by half its value for this turn.
Vanish Trick
Discard your hand. Discarded cards can't be drawn until next turn.
Scry
Enemy draws a card. Show their entire hand.
Sharpen
Give +1 power to a card for the rest of the battle. Flawless, special and +10 cards cannot be upgraded.
Introspect
Discard a Blue card. Increase your limit by 2 for this turn.
Might of Pride
Discard a purple card. Increase damage by 2 until end of battle.
Growing Warmth
Discard all Orange cards in hand. Increase Limit by 1 for each discarded card until end of battle.
Retaliate
If you were hit by the enemy last turn, increase power by +4. If you also discard an Orange card, the spell doesn't go on cooldown.
Arcane Hammer
Discard 2 cards with equal values. Deal 22 damage.
Unstable Bolt
Discard 2 to 5 cards. For each odd value, increase damage for the turn by 7. For each even value, deal 4 damage.
Unity Power
For each card of the color you have most of in hand, Increase your power for this turn by +1.
Heavy Bolt
Discard a card with value of 5 or more. Deal damage 4 times its value.
Intimidate
Discard up to 6 Purple cards. Deal 4 damage for each card discarded.
Recycle
Return a card to your draw pile. Increase power for this turn by +1.
Lighten
Reduce a card's value by 1 for the rest of battle.
Quick Bolt
If you only drew the 2 starting cards, deal damage 4 times the sum of their values.
Weakness Exploit
Discard a Blue card. For each card in the Enemy's hand with a value lower than the discarded card, deal 6 damage.
Expand Mind
Increase your Limit by 5 and value of each card in hand by 1, both until next turn.
Flawless Obedience
Turn a Flawless Beast into a 2-value card for this turn.
Dragon's Fury
Turn all colored cards in hand into Red cards for this turn.
Steel Feather
Discard a Purple or Orange card to modify damage for this turn. If it's Purple, you get 6 damage. If it's Orange, your enemy loses 8 damage.
